name: Creative Image Slider – Responsive Slider Plugin
author: Creative Solutions

sections.description:
Creative Image Slider is a powerful image slider with amazing visual effects. It has integrated Creative Popup wizard, to make the slider more attractive!
It is packed with a live-preview wizard to create fantastic sliders in a matter of seconds without coding. Over 35,000+ sites are already using Creative Image Slider.

Useful Links:

  • Homepage
  • Live Demo
  • Documentation
  • Contact Us

Main Fetures:

  • Creative horizontal scrolling. It uses horizontal scrolling, to make the slider more creative!
  • Creative Popup. It has integrated Creative Popup Wizard, to make it more attractive… See Demo
  • Place sliders anywhere. You can use shortcode, to insert sliders anywhere in content!
  • Flexible auto-play. Two auto-play types: Evenly scrolling, and by steps. Customizable speed, scroll delay, start delay etc.
  • Live-preview wizard. It is packed with a live-preview wizard to create fantastic sliders in a matter of seconds without coding!
  • Flexible overlay. You can customize overlay of each item: change text styles, button styles, overlay opacity etc.
  • Creative button styles. It comes with 6 button styles, and more than 30 button icons.
  • Creative arrows. It comes with 45 arrow types, and flexible customization tool.
  • Very easy to install and configure. You can install it, and make it work in 5 minutes.

Other Creative Plugins:

  • Contact Form Generator – Contact form builder for WordPress! Live Demo
  • GSpeech – Speaks any text in your site! Live Demo

IMPORTANT: If you think you found a bug in Creative Image Slider or have any problem or question concerning it, do not hesitate to contact us at info@creative-solutions.net.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire creative-image-slider folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or upload the .zip package through Plugins->Add New->Upload.
  2. Activate the plugin via ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Enjoy the result.

You will find “Creative Image Slider”‘” menu in your WordPress admin panel.

Use it and be happy!
sections.changelog:
V 2.5.0 – 06/02/2024

  • XSS issue fixed
  • WP 6.4.3 tested
  • UI improvements

V 2.1.3 – 31/08/2023

  • added css file

V 2.1.1 – 31/08/2023

  • added css file

V 2.1.0 – 03/04/2023

  • 6.2 tested release

V 2.0.3 – 18/07/2020

  • Fixed “Deprecated: Methods with the same name as their class will not be constructors in a future version of PHP” issue
  • Fixed “Deprecated: Function create_function() is deprecated” issue

V 2.0.2 – 10/06/2020

  • Fixed issue saving page in wp-admin, when it returns invalid json result error message.

V 2.0.1 – 02/10/2019

  • Some CSS corrections.

V 2.0.0 – 06/08/2017

  • Added Zoom/Link icons.
  • Added Item Overlay Type.
  • Added Hover Animation Effects.
  • Added multiple slider support at same page.

V 1.0.2 – 16/09/2016

  • Fixed CSS bug.
  • Changed allowed items count in free version, set to 5.

V 1.0.1 – 15/09/2015

  • Fixed JS bug.
  • Changed description.

V 1.0.0 – 15/09/2014

  • Initial release.

sections.reviews:
Very nice, but overly restrictive noncommercial version limits usability

By WebDragon on September 3, 2016

delete the demo slider and items, add a new slider, and it tells you to buy the commercial version if you want more than five items (you currently have NONE at this point) and won't let you add ANY (not even just one) images to your new empty slider.

needs work. too much greed. It looks great, but I can't even demo the thing with a client's images for a homepage slider

Excellent product, excellent support

By scottishalex on September 3, 2016

Excellent service and support is not a given when buying plugins, but Simon went well beyond that.

The slider itself is first class and does what I needed most which was to be able to show images with different ratios, both landscape and portrait without having to crop or resize, and not be restricted to a fixed width for each image, so no blank spaces.

There's a lot more to the slider that I haven't even looked at yet, but what I am using is perfect.

I think images and photos should be shown as they were intended, not cropped to a fixed ratio. Every image is unique and Creative Image Slider respects that.

And it's very cheap, and that's without even going into the time saved not having to work out the best crop for each image.

Perfect images slider I was looking for!

By Mercury_pl on September 3, 2016

This is pice of great work!
Very extensive plugin, with plenty options in order to customize your own slider. Very easy to implenet on wordpress site, intuitive menus. What is more author is openminded person for customer requests! - which is very important.

Without any doubt I can recommend this plugin.
Nice work!

short_description: Creative Image Slider is a responsive jQuery image slider with amazing visual effects.
